mapper.update: update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, clink_num = #{clinkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select id, title, type, update_time, number from article order by type desc
select id, title from article where TYPE NOT IN (0,5) order by clink_num desc limit 0,6
select id, title, author, type, update_time, clink_num, number from article where type=0 or type=5 order by id desc limit #{firstResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{maxResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from article where type=0 or type=5
